import React, { useRef } from 'react' import "./NavBar.css" import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { faCaretDown } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' import { useState } from 'react' function NavBar() { const [show, setShow] = useState(false) const ref = useRef() return (
{ show?

:null } setShow(!show)} className="icon" icon={faCaretDown} color="white"/>
) } export default NavBar
